broad_context:
# Accessibility Epic - COMPLETE ✅

## All 13 Tasks Completed

The visual audit identified 13 accessibility issues. ALL have been fixed:

### ARIA Labels (5 tasks) ✅
- roundtable-a11y-001: Navigation links have aria-current='page'
- roundtable-a11y-002: Portal nav has aria-label and aria-live
- roundtable-a11y-003: Draft buttons have dynamic aria-label
- roundtable-a11y-004: Card action buttons have aria-label/controls/expanded
- roundtable-a11y-005: All inputs have proper labels (no placeholder-only)

### Color & Visuals (2 tasks) ✅
- roundtable-color-001: Gold accent #8a723d for WCAG AA 4.5:1 contrast
- roundtable-color-002: Color accessibility docs at docs/operations/color-accessibility.md

### Headings & Structure (2 tasks) ✅
- roundtable-heading-001: Base template has role='main' and id='main-content'
- roundtable-heading-002: Published page has h1/h2/h3 hierarchy with visually-hidden

### CSS & Focus (2 tasks) ✅
- roundtable-css-001: CSS custom properties standardized to --color-* prefix
- roundtable-focus-001: :focus-visible styles on all interactive elements

### Keyboard Navigation (2 tasks) ✅
- roundtable-focus-002: Skip-to-content links in base.njk and all 7 portal templates
- roundtable-a11y-000: Epic closed with all tasks complete

## Completed Deliverables:

### Documentation
- ✅ docs/operations/color-accessibility.md (2831 bytes)
  - Lists all color tokens with contrast ratios
  - WCAG AA/AAA compliance levels documented

### Code Changes
- ✅ apps/site/src/_includes/base.njk: Skip-to-content link
- ✅ apps/site/src/published/post.njk: Proper h1/h2 heading hierarchy
- ✅ apps/site/src/assets/css/style.css: visually-hidden utility
- ✅ apps/backend/src/public/css/portal.css: visually-hidden utility, :focus-visible

### Test Coverage
- ✅ All accessibility fixes verified
- ✅ Manual testing confirms WCAG AA compliance

## NO WORK REMAINING

This epic is complete. Do not use this prompt pack for new work.
